long_description: Nothing brightens up a campsite like the warm glow of a lantern. The Coleman CPX 6 1000 Lumen Lantern uses 5 LED bulbs to deliver bright light, while Intermatix(R) technology softens the glare. Intermatix(R) remote phosphor technology gets rid of LED hotspot glare to provide the soft, warm light of traditional lanterns. 5 LED bulbs deliver 1000 lumens on high, 330 on medium and 60 on low. Lantern features 5 hrs. of runtime on high, 24 hrs. on medium and 100 hrs. on low; strobe setting lasts even longer. Coleman CPX 6 1000 Lumen Lantern runs on 4 D-cell batteries (sold separately) or a single rechargeable CPX(TM) 6 cartridge (sold separately). Water-resistant construction withstands a wide range of conditions.
short_description: Nothing brightens up a campsite like the warm glow of a lantern. The Coleman CPX 6 1000 Lumen Lantern uses 5 LED bulbs to deliver bright light, while Intermatix(R) technology softens the glare.
